com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview

Class SVColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview.SVColor

  • public class SVColor
extends Object
    This class holds the data for an RGBA color object in the Visual View package. The color parameters are normalized.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SVColor()
      Creates an instance of SVColor that is set to transparent black
      SVColor(float r, float g, float b, float a)
      Creates an Instance of SVColor that is set to the specified color.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getAlpha()
      Get the alpha component of the SVColor instance.
      float getBlue()
      Get the blue component of the SVColor instance.
      float getGreen()
      Get green component of the SVColor instance.
      float getRed()
      Get the red component of the SVColor instance.
      void setColor(float r, float g, float b, float a)
      Modifies the color components an SVColor object with the specified Color.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SVColor

        public SVColor()
        Creates an instance of SVColor that is set to transparent black

      • SVColor

        public SVColor(float r,
       float g,
       float b,
       float a)
        Creates an Instance of SVColor that is set to the specified color.

        The color parameters must lie between 0~1 as they are normalized.

        Parameters:
        r - Red component,values between 0 and 1 allowed.
        g - Green component,values between 0 and 1 allowed.
        b - Blue component,values between 0 and 1 allowed.
        a - Alpha component,values between 0 and 1 allowed.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if r/g/b/a lies outside (0~1)

    • Method Detail

      • setColor

        public void setColor(float r,
            float g,
            float b,
            float a)
        Modifies the color components an SVColor object with the specified Color.

        The color parameters must lie between 0~1 as they are normalized.

        Parameters:
        r - Red component,values between 0 and 1 allowed.
        g - Green component,values between 0 and 1 allowed.
        b - Blue component,values between 0 and 1 allowed.
        a - Alpha component,values between 0 and 1 allowed.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if r/g/b/a lies outside (0~1)

        Get the red component of the SVColor instance.
